column1: The text introduces the policy, a section, or a group of practices, but it does not mention a specific practice.
The text describes how to contact the company with questions, concerns, or complaints about the privacy policy.
The text describes a specific data practice that is not covered by our label scheme.
The site collects your location information for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
The policy makes generic security statements, e.g., "we protect your data" or "we use technology/encryption to protect your data".
The policy makes specific provisions for international audiences, non-US citizens, or non-European citizens (e.g., about international data transfer).
The site collects your demographic information for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
An unnamed third party does receive your unspecified personal information for service operations or security. The data is personally identifiable.
The policy makes a statement about how data from children is treated.
The policy makes a statement about how data from Californian users is treated (e.g., California privacy rights).
An unnamed third party does receive your unspecified personal information for legal requirements. The data is personally identifiable.
The site collects your unspecified information for personalization or customization. Collection happens on the website.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of generic personal information by a third party, which collects or receives it for advertising.
A named third party does track on the first party website or app your cookies or tracking elements for targeted advertising.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of unspecified information by an unspecified party for marketing purposes.
The site collects your IP address or device IDs for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
The site collects your unspecified information for marketing purposes. Collection happens on the website.
The site collects your unspecified information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens on the website.
The site collects your unspecified information for analytics or research. Collection happens on the website.
The site collects your unspecified information for advertising. Collection happens on the website.
The site collects your website activities for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
A named third party does track on the first party website or app your activities on the website or app for targeted advertising.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of generic personal information by a third party, which collects or receives it for marketing purposes.
The site collects your computer information for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
Do Not Track headers are mentioned but it is unclear if the company adheres to the user's Do Not Track preference.
The site collects your unspecified information for service operations or security. Collection happens on the website.
You can use third party privacy settings to control the use of unspecified information by a third party, which uses it for advertising.
A named third party does not receive your contact information for an unspecified purpose. The data is personally identifiable. You can opt in for data collection.

The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website.

An unspecified third party does receive your activities on the website or app for an additional (non-basic) service or feature.

When a change of a variety outside of our label scheme is made to the privacy policy, users are notified in a manner outside of our label scheme. Users must agree before their data is treated according to the new privacy policy.

The site collects your unspecified information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information on the website, and your data is identifiable.
